text: Say Lou Lou is a dream pop band. They are Elektra Kilbey and Miranda Kilbey. They are twin sisters. They were called Saint Lou Lou until January 2013. ==Career== Say Lou Lou started in 2012. In August 2012 Say Lou Lou performed at the Popaganda Festival in Stockholm. On September 5 2012 Vogue put them in their magazine as Artist of the Week. On 15 November 2013 Say Lou Lou released the EP Better in the Dark on Sony Music.https://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/better-in-the-dark- ep/id721148772?affId=2285242 In December 2013 BBC put them on their list of nominees for the Sound of 2014 prize. Their first album will be released in 2014 by Columbia Records. Say Lou Lou sometimes lived in Stockholm and sometimes live in Sydney.They now live in London. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:2012 establishments Category:Musical groups from Sydney Category:Musicians from Stockholm Category:Swedish musical groups Category:Alternative rock bands
title: Say Lou Lou
